original: 啟稟大人，<color=#bceea7>$city1</color>假癡不癲計謀完美成功！<color=#bceea7>3個月</color>內，偽裝我方武將數<color=#ea301c>大減5成</color>，引敵方掉以輕心前來攻打！(<color=#bceea7>假癡不癲 大成功</color>)
text: Enlighten your lord, <color=#bceea7>$city1</color> is the perfect success of the fake, idiotic, and nonchalant strategy! In <color=#bceea7>3 months</color>, the number of camouflage our military commanders will be reduced by <color=#ea301c>50%</color>, and the enemy will be attacked lightly! (<color=#bceea7>Fake infatuation is not a big success</color>)
